text: Hi there! How can I help you today?
It's nice to meet you, Ankit!

I don't know anything about you!  I have no memory of past conversations and I'm a large language model, not a person. To tell you about *you*, I need information from you.  Tell me about yourself – what are your interests, your hobbies, your job, your personality?  The more you tell me, the better I can "tell you about you."
